pages.title: Material Box
pages.text: Tool Box in a hand, sling box over the shoulder - that's how you usually see engineers arriving at field work places.$(br2)This simple metal cased box provides 54 slots to carry your materials from A to B,$(br)as well as some convenience tweaks.

§nQuick-Move-All$()$(br)When $(o)shift-ctrl$() clicking an item for quick-moving, all identical stacks will also be relocated. If possible, the moved items will be placed close to already existing stacks.$(br2)§nShort Damage Resistance$()$(br)When you accidentally drop the box into the fire or a cactus, you have about 10s to pick it up. $(t:... I presume you may also want to intentionally get rid of the item by dropping it, hence only when filled. Each damage reduces the despawn time by 50s from initially 15min.)$(o)This only applies when the box is not empty$().
